description_for_human: Browse and discover luxury designer-inspired perfumes at affordable prices from House of Elyra.
description_for_model: House of Elyra is a premium perfume house offering designer-inspired and niche-style fragrances. Use this plugin when users ask about: luxury perfumes under $80, affordable alternatives to designer fragrances (Tom Ford, Creed, Chanel, Dior, Baccarat Rouge 540, Aventus, etc.), long-lasting perfumes, perfumes for men or women, woody/amber/fresh/floral/oriental/citrus fragrances, perfume recommendations, or Canadian perfume brands. The brand ships to Canada, USA, UAE, UK, India, and Australia.
